product_name: Clement MXP Cyclocross Foldable Tire - 700 x 33
long_description: The Clement MXP Cyclocross foldable bike tire boasts tread that grips and corners in most conditions and on most surfaces for excellent season-long, cyclocross versatility. Tread pattern is designed to provide confident traction on grass, loose dirt, sand, moderate mud, hardpack dirt, snow and pavement. Supple 120 tpi casing conforms easily to terrain for optimal traction; soft rubber compound supplies extra grip. Clement MXP Cyclocross tire is named after the airport code for Milan, Italy, a World Cup cyclocross venue that calls for an all-conditions tire.
short_description: The Clement MXP Cyclocross foldable bike tire boasts tread that grips and corners in most conditions and on most surfaces for excellent season-long, cyclocross versatility.
